School (district) : River Valley Elementary  (West Ada School District)
Role(s) : Early Elementary Teacher (K-2nd);
LinkedIn Profile : Outside of the classroom, I love building different things and learning about health.  

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am eager to be part of this program because of my passion for learning. I thrive in environments where I can learn new concepts, as I find the process both enjoyable and rewarding. I hope to grow both personally and professionally, and I look forward to bringing the insights and experiences I gain back to my classroom, where I can use them to inspire and support the growth of my students.
